Replace.Text: An emergency Recruitment Centre, when completed a melee unit will be created from the available personnel and equipment in this city, and the building is removed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Note that this building is not always available, recruitment is limited to war time or when Barbarians are menacing the city.[NEWLINE]The requisition cost of the unit's equipment will be removed from your treasury when it's completed.[NEWLINE]If your city equipment and resources are pillaged by attacking units while the Recruitment Centre is build, the drafted unit may be initialized with a very low health.
More storage for eqipment and housing for personnel, allowing better availability for the emergency Recruitment Centre.
Allows fishing boats to be send on Sea Resources in the City exploitation range.
A building for the makers of bows, arrows, and other archery goods.
Allows the production of various Swords, which may raise the supply cost for your units
Allows the production of Steel Weapons, which may raise the supply cost for your units
A building for forging armour (such as greaves, breastplates and legplates).[NEWLINE]Allows the production of Plate Armor, which may raise the supply cost for your units

The Farrier maintains the health and balance of the horse's feet through the trimming of the hoof and placement of horseshoes, a necessity when putting heavy armor on the horse.[NEWLINE]Allows the training of Armored Horses, which may raise the supply cost for your units
Allows clearing of Marsh.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Food] Food on all Farms adjacent to rivers.
+1 [ICON_Production] Production to the Mine improvement.[NEWLINE]+8 [ICON_Food] Food on all Farms.
Farm improvements now gain +2 [ICON_Food] Food from every 2 adjacent Farms.
Introduce Mechanized Agriculture. +4 [ICON_Food] Food from each adjacent Farm.
[NEWLINE]You can now improve your soldiers cohesion and discipline by allowing them to create a caste with its own rules.
[NEWLINE]You can now research how to navigate on the seas.
Project which provides [ICON_Gold] Gold every turn.
Create a Garrison Melee unit.[NEWLINE]Garrisoned unit will not disband but can not move from the Village.
Gather 75% of the total population of all your settlements and abandon your position to start a Migration.[NEWLINE]Conscripted units will not disband until you've settled again.

Conscript Slaves into a Worker unit.[NEWLINE]The worker unit does not create new improvements, but passively gather Resources at its position.[NEWLINE]You can disband it to get back the Slaves in your Village.

Create a new Village to collect resources on a tile and all adjacent tiles.[NEWLINE]A road will be constructed between your Central Village and the new village.[NEWLINE]This will also create a migration movement to the new Village from your Central Village.[NEWLINE]Villages can't be adjacent to each other.
Prioritize [ICON_RESOURCE_MATERIEL] Materiel production.[NEWLINE]Materiel is produced at a lower rate when this is not the Village current task.
Prioritize Equipment production.[NEWLINE]Equipment is produced at a lower rate when this is not the Village current task.[NEWLINE]Materiel stock reserve is lower when this task is prioritized.

Rebuild this Village to collect resources on its tile and all adjacent tiles.[NEWLINE]A road will be constructed between your Central Village and this Village.[NEWLINE]This will also create a migration movement to the rebuild Village from your Central Village.

Using various methods, raise the assimilation rate of other Ethnicities Population into yours.[NEWLINE]Luxuries resources will be used as gifts to gain influence and raise even more the assimilation rate.[NEWLINE]Slaves are assimilated faster than Free Population, but are only assimilated when this is the Village current task.
Using various methods, force other Ethnicities Population to migrate from your Central Village to other Villages to raise your Ethnicity influence over the Central Village.
Using various methods, force Population from your other Villages to immigrate into your Central Village to raise its Population.
